author: FE Online
title: Valentines Week Special 2017: When is Rose Day, Propose Day, Chocolate Day, Promise Day, Teddy Day, Hug Day 2017
text:
Lifestyle Valentines Week Special 2017: When is Rose Day, Propose Day, Chocolate Day, Promise Day, Teddy Day, Hug Day 2017 Valentines Week Special 2017: When is Rose Day, Propose Day, Chocolate Day, Promise Day, Teddy Day, Hug Day 2017 February 14 is celebrated in the honour of St Valentine who was a Roman priest who was martyred in AD 269 and buried on the Via Flaminia. By: FE Online | New Delhi  56 PM 
Valentines Week Special. Source: Reuters 
Valentine’s Day also known as Saint Valentine’s Day or the Feast of Saint Valentine is a special day for every person who is in love but not many know the real reason behind the celebration of this day. February 14 is celebrated in the honour of St Valentine who was a Roman priest who was martyred in AD 269 and buried on the Via Flaminia. To celebrate this day as a tribute to the priest, lovers from all over the world exchange gifts on the day. Valentine’s Day is not just about romance, it is a celebration of love which can be acknowledge in any special way to all your near and dear ones. The Valentine Week 2017 begins with Rose Day on February 7, which is then followed by Propose Day on February 8, Chocolate Day on February 9, Teddy Day on February 10, Promise Day on February 11, Hug Day on February 12, Kiss Day on February 13, and ending with Valentine’s Day on February 14. Rose Day. Source: Reuters 
February 7- Rose Day Flowers are a popular symbol for expressing ones feeling of ‘love’, or ‘like’ for another person. Like other flowers, Roses portray different meanings and sentiments. Red roses give the unmistakable expression of love. White roses express the strong innocence in the beginning of a relationship. Yellow colour express friendship, gift a yellow rose to a friend to brighten up their day. Pink and peach is a colour that represents modesty, gracefulness and they express admiration, gift a pink or a peach rose to a person to whom you want to send a subtle message of appreciation or admiration. 
February 8- Propose Day The second day in the Valentine Week is celebrated as the Propose Day. This is the perfect day for people who want to propose to their loved ones and pamper them with gifts and flowers. Chocolate Day. Source: Reuters 
February 9- Chocolate Day Nothing gets better than an entire day that is dedicated to nothing but chocolates! When gifted to someone chocolates enhances the charm of any relationship and puts people in a good mood. The best way to pamper a dear one is gift lots and lots of chocolate. Teddy Day. Source: Reuters 
February 10-Teddy Day After charming your loved one with some sweetness, send a symbol of cuteness to them. A cute and adorable teddy bear brings out the child in that is hidden in everyone. Gift a teddy bear to a girl and see her smiling like a child. 
February 11- Promise Day When it comes to healthy relationships, promises play a vital role. Love is an unconditional commitment between two imperfect people. It comes with a lot of responsibilities and commitments. Making big promises and fulfilling them with utmost dedication keeps any relationship alive. Promise Day is the day to communicate your commitment to your partner. 
February 12- Hug Day Just two days before Valentine’s Day comes Hug Day. A hug expresses protection, affection and care. When we hug someone, oxytocin is released into our body which lowers stress and heart-related problems. A hug does not only expresses love but also heals the heart. Kiss day. Source: Reuters 
February 13- Kiss Day The second last day of the Valentine’s Week is one of the most popular days of the entire Week. On this day lovers get a golden opportunity to express their love with a sweet gesture. 
February 14- Valentine’s Day February 14 is the big day that holds a lot of importance in a couple’s life. Make sure that you express your love to the one on this day. Don’t worry if you do not have anyone special in your life. Celebrate it with your friends and make the most of it. 
Wish you a Happy Valentine Week in advance, hope this weeks turns out the way you want it to.
